about_the_game:
In a world of bunny societies, existence was shattered when an evil pharmaceutical company, known for its sinister experiments, bioengineered a virus that unleashed a catastrophic zombie outbreak. In the aftermath of the outbreak, you find yourself leading a group of survivors in a world where fluffy tails and twitching noses now hide a dark and dangerous secret.

CRAFT TOOLS AND WEAPONS

Survive and thrive in a post-apocalyptic world! Gather materials, craft essential tools, and create powerful weapons to defend your colony.

FIGHT OFF HORDES

Prepare your colonists to fend off waves of infected! Craft weapons, fortify your defenses, and use tactical combat to survive against ever-growing hordes.

GROW YOUR COLONY

Expand and upgrade your colony by constructing new buildings, gathering essential resources, and training your colonists to improve their skills.

EXPLORE SECRET LABORATORIES

Venture beyond your colony into distant, dangerous worlds, searching for hidden laboratories that hold valuable research pages.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content and Frequent Violence or Gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Balance survival with strategic combat in this unique simulation. Lead a bunny colony through a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombie bunnies. Manage resources, construct a thriving settlement, and navigate intricate social dynamics to uncover the cure held by one of your survivors.
